paper_abstract: The R package mosclust (model order selection for clustering problems) implements algorithms based on the concept of stability for discovering significant structures in bio-molecular data. The software library provides stability indices obtained through different data perturbations methods (resampling, random projections, noise injection), as well as statistical tests to assess the significance of multi-level structures singled out from the data. Availability:http://homes.dsi.unimi.it/similar to valenti/SW/mosclust/download/ mosclust_ 1.0.tar.gz Contact:valentini@dsi.unimi.it Supplementary information:http://homes.dsi.unimi.it/similar to valenti/SW/ mosclust.
paper_title: Mosclust: a software library for discovering significant structures in bio-molecular data
